pages.text: Ta shuo:`Zhexie shi wo de nu'er, ruguo nimen yao ganshenme.'
Zhi ni de shouming fashi, tamen bi jiang fanghuang yu ziji de diankuang zhi zhong.
Nahan sheng zai ri chu shi xijile tamen.
Wo shi nage shi zhen tianfandifu, bing shi tao shixiang yudian ban jiangluo zai tamen shenshang.
Duiyu neng kaocha zhe, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Nage shi zhen que shi zai yitiao rengran cunzai de daolushang de.
Duiyu xindao zhe, ci zhong que you yizhong jixiang.
Na conglin de jumin que shi buyi de,
guwo chengzhile tamen. Zhe liang ge difang dou zai pingtan de lu shang.
Shigu de jumin que yi fouren shizhemen.
Wo que yi ba wo de xuduo jixiang zhaoshi tamen, dan tamen beilile ta.
Tamen anquan de zao shan wei wu,
dan nahan sheng zai zaochen xijile tamen.
Tamen suo mouqiu de, duiyu tamen wujiyushi.
Wo zhi ping zhenli chuangzao tiandi wanwu, fuhuo shi shi biding lailin de. Suoyi ni yingdang wenhe di yuanliang zhongren.
Ni de zhu que shi chuangzao wanwu de zhu, que shi quanzhi de.
Wo que yi shangci ni changchang fanfu songdu de qi jie jing wen he weida de “gulanjing”.
Ni buyao jiyu wo suo shi tamen zhong ge deng ren suo xiangshou de shiwu, ni buyao wei tamen er bei'ai. Ni yingdang wenhe di duidai xinshimen.
Ni shuo:`Wo que shi tanshuai de jinggao zhe.'
Na zhengru wo suo jiang shi fenpei zhemen de (dongxi) yiyang de,
